title: 17-year-old shot in New Iberia, authorities say
content:
NEW IBERIA -- Deputies say a 17-year-old boy has been shot in the abdomen in New Iberia.
Local news organizations report that the shooting happened Sunday night near an intersection.
Iberia Parish Sheriff's Office Captain Wendell Rayborn says deputies responded to the incident and found the unidentified teen suffering from a single gunshot wound. The victim was conscious and speaking to deputies. He was taken to the hospital for treatment. His current condition is unknown.
The investigation is ongoing.
Anyone with additional information is asked to contact authorities.
